mentions.context: Reads were assembled using CLC Genomics Workbench v. 6 software (Qiagen Bioinformatics, Aarhus, Denmark).
Annotations were performed by using the RAST server (9) and NCBI PGAP (http://ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/genome/annotation_prok), and prophages were examined using the PHAge search tool (PHAST) (10).
